Note: Used in Sign English systems to represent the English word “are”. Representing English words that do not normally occur in Auslan is sometimes necessary, e.g., when someone is “reading out” in signs to a group of people the contents of something written in English, or when someone is quoting “word for word” in signs what someone else said or wrote in English.
